items.name: ansi-output
items.title: ANSI Output
items.description: Components for rendering ANSI escape sequences as colored text in notebook outputs. Includes AnsiOutput, AnsiStreamOutput, and AnsiErrorOutput variants.

items.name: image-output
items.title: Image Output
items.description: Component for rendering images in notebook outputs. Handles base64-encoded image data from Jupyter kernels as well as regular URLs. Supports PNG, JPEG, GIF, and WebP.

items.name: html-output
items.title: HTML Output
items.description: Component for rendering HTML content in notebook outputs. Handles pandas DataFrames, rich HTML displays, and interactive widgets. Includes unsafe mode for script execution in sandboxed iframes.

items.name: svg-output
items.title: SVG Output
items.description: Component for rendering SVG graphics in notebook outputs. Handles matplotlib figures, diagrams, and other vector graphics with proper scaling.

items.name: markdown-output
items.title: Markdown Output
items.description: Component for rendering Markdown content in notebook outputs. Supports GitHub Flavored Markdown (GFM) with tables, task lists, and syntax-highlighted code blocks.

items.name: json-output
items.title: JSON Output
items.description: Component for rendering JSON data in an interactive, expandable tree view. Useful for inspecting complex data structures and API responses.
